name: The Life of a Magical Circle
storyline: Somewhere in the universe, a traveler comes across some strange creatures. As he observes them, he is reminded of his own life and his failure to fulfill his purpose, and he begins to reflect upon the choices he has made...
summary:
The Life of a Magical Circle is a narrated roguelite in which you dodge obstacles and pick up circles. Some of the circles are part of your goal, but some of them are just for fun. It's up to you to figure out which is which and to try to stay focused.

You know how we all have a dream we want to follow, but it's more fun to watch Netflix and play video games instead? This is a game about that.
